summary: Codex initial audit of IKU Sound static marketing site.
details: 4 static HTML pages share fixed header/footer chrome with css/estilos.css for layout and js/menuapp.js for the hamburger nav.
Assets rely on local img/audio media plus Google Fonts and Font Awesome CDN links.
Accented Spanish characters render incorrectly because the files were saved with the wrong encoding despite declaring UTF-8.
Servicios, Staff, and Contact pages keep a stray '<html' token at EOF and contacto uses form_validacion.js which references an undefined 'form' handle, so validation never attaches.
El usuario pide que todas las respuestas para este proyecto sean en castellano.
